    • Method Detail

      • getCompositeDistribution

        private static PgCompositeDistribution getCompositeDistribution​(List<ModeReport> modeReports,
                                                                int sampleSize)
        Creates a composite distribution from a list of mode reports.
        Parameters:
        modeReports - list of mode reports obtained from the sample analysis
        sampleSize - the size of the original sample
        Returns:
        a PgCompositeDistribution composed of individual distributions and their corresponding weights computed based on the sample proportions

      • findModeValues

        private static Sample findModeValues​(Sample sample,
                                     RangedMode mode)

      • analyze

        public AnalysisResult analyze​(List<Double> values)
        Analyzes the given list of values to detect modes and fit distributions.
        Parameters:
        values - a list of latency values to analyze
        Returns:
        an AnalysisResult containing the results of the analysis

      • recursiveModeDetection

        private AnalysisResult recursiveModeDetection​(StatAnalyzer.ParamTestSample paramTestSample,
                                              PgCompositeDistribution initialDistribution,
                                              ModalityData initialModalityData,
                                              List<ModeReport> modeReports,
                                              int originalSampleSize)
        Performs recursive mode detection by filtering data points below PDF. Detecting additional modes and refining composite distribution
        Parameters:
        paramTestSample - original sample containing data points
        initialDistribution - initial composite distribution before recursive detection
        initialModalityData - initial modality data detected before recursion
        modeReports - list to store mode reports found during analysis
        originalSampleSize - original size of sample before filtering
        Returns:
        AnalysisResult containing updated modality data, mode reports and refined composite distribution

      • combinePdfWithScaling

        public PgCompositeDistribution combinePdfWithScaling​(PgCompositeDistribution originalDistribution,
                                                     PgCompositeDistribution lowlandDistribution,
                                                     long totalModeSize,
                                                     long sampleSize)
        Combines original PDF with weighted sum of PDFs.
        Parameters:
        totalModeSize - total size of modes, which is used to calculate weight of lowland PDF
        sampleSize - size of original sample, which is used to calculate weight of original PDF
        Returns:
        new function that represents combined PDF with scaled contributions

      • getModeReports

        private List<ModeReport> getModeReports​(StatAnalyzer.ParamTestSample sample,
                                        ModalityData modalityData)
        Generates mode reports for each detected mode in parallel.
        Parameters:
        modalityData - the modality data containing detected modes
        Returns:
        a list of ModeReport objects for each ranged mode

      • findModes

        public ModalityData findModes​(WeightedSample sample)
        Finds the modes in the given sample using the mode detector.
        Parameters:
        sample - the sample from which to detect modes
        Returns:
        a ModalityData object containing the detected modes

      • splitParamsTest

        public StatAnalyzer.ParamTestSample splitParamsTest​(Sample sample)
        Splits the given sample into two samples for parameter estimating, and testing.
        Parameters:
        sample - the sample to split
        Returns:
        a Pair containing the parameter sample and test sample

      • getModeReport

        public ModeReport getModeReport​(StatAnalyzer.ParamTestSample sample,
                                RangedMode mode)
        Generates a report for the specified mode based on the fitted distributions.
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode for which to generate the report
        Returns:
        a ModeReport containing the results for the mode

      • fitDistribution

        public List<FittedDistribution> fitDistribution​(Sample parametersSample,
                                                Sample testSample)
        Fits various distributions to the provided parameter and test samples.
        Parameters:
        parametersSample - the sample used for estimating parameters
        testSample - the sample used for testing the fit
        Returns:
        a list of FittedDistribution objects containing the fitted distributions and their p-values
